item.title: Why Every R Package Wrapping External Tools Needs a sitrep() Function
item.description: Stop playing “diagnostics ping-pong” with your users. This post explores why the _sitrep() (situation report) pattern — popularized by the usethis package — is a game-changer for R packages wrapping APIs or external software. Learn how to build structured validation functions that power both early error-handling and comprehensive system reports, featuring real-world implementation examples from the meetupr and freesurfer packages.
